summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in blocks 19 and 20, Law's 2nd Addition being the alley between 1st Avenue West and Queen Anne Avenue, from West Garfield Street to West Blaine Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 103759 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
